EMOTIONAL_JOURNEY.Turning_points: Realization that the merge cannot be reversed
EMOTIONAL_JOURNEY.Emotional_triggers: Frustration upon learning the merge is irreversible, relief when understanding the issue is manageable

PAIN_POINTS.Main_frustrations: Inability to reverse the merge of candidate profiles
PAIN_POINTS.Unmet_expectations: Expected a feature to reverse merges
PAIN_POINTS.Process_friction_points: Manual recreation of the old record

POSITIVE_MOMENTS.What_delighted_them: Quick and helpful guidance on how to manually recreate the record
POSITIVE_MOMENTS.Appreciated_actions: Detailed instructions on accessing the change log
POSITIVE_MOMENTS.Trust_building_moments: Assurance that the issue is manageable and not critical

CUSTOMER_NEEDS.Stated_needs: Assistance with a merged candidate profile issue

RETENTION_STRATEGIES.Immediate_actions_needed: Follow-up to ensure the manual recreation was successful
RETENTION_STRATEGIES.Follow-up_requirements: Check-in to discuss any further assistance needed
RETENTION_STRATEGIES.Loyalty_building_opportunities: Offer training or tips on best practices for profile management
